src:
Catherine Deneuve internada

06 Nov 2019, 08:38

A atriz Catherine Deneuve passou mal e foi internada num hospital de Paris.
O Le Parisien publicou que a condição de Deneuve é grave. A assessoria da atriz, por sua vez, afirma que ela teve um mal-estar por fadiga.
Deneuve tem 76 anos.
text:
Catherine Deneuve hospitalized

Nov 06 2019, 08:38

Actress Catherine Deneuve was ill and was admitted to a hospital in Paris.
Le Parisien reported that Deneuve's condition is serious. The actress's advisory, in turn, states that she had a discomfort due to fatigue.
Deneuve is 76 years old.
